## Cell cycle scoring Analysis and Visualization.


```{r}
# Access the contents of the cc.genes.updated.2019 variable
cc.genes.updated.2019
```

```{r}
# Calculate cell cycle scores using the CellCycleScoring function
# s.features represents the S-phase genes, and g2m.features represents the G2M-phase genes
# set.ident = TRUE sets the identified cell cycle phases based on the scores
CellCycleScoring(aligned_rat_merged, s.features = cc.genes.updated.2019$s.genes, g2m.features = cc.genes.updated.2019$g2m.genes, set.ident = TRUE) -> data
```


```{r}
#Access the data obtained form cell cycling score
data[[]]
```


```{r}
# Create a umap embedding plot of the data using the DimPlot function representing the G1 and G2M and S
DimPlot(data, reduction = "umap" )
```
